title: Acer announces new Swift 3 and Swift 5 laptops with Intel Alder Lake CPUs
content:
Hot on the heels of Intel announcing details of its 12th-generation Alder Lake processors from the P and U series, Acer has announced some new laptops that will be powered by Intel’s new hardware. The new Acer Swift 5 and Swift 3 both come with Intel’s latest CPUs, though Acer doesn’t specify exactly which processors

The post Acer announces new Swift 3 and Swift 5 laptops with Intel Alder Lake CPUs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Acer has announced a new version of the Swift 5 laptop with Intel Alder Lake CPUs and a 16:10 touchscreen. There's also a new Swift 3.
